   The City's annual event returns to North Cove Park, on Saturday, December 14, 2025, from 4 - 7 pm. [Read on...](https://www.lakestevenswa.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=1024)
4. [![Cavalero Skate Park drone image](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)](https://www.lakestevenswa.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=1023)

5. [![Mayor meet up flyer square](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)](https://www.lakestevenswa.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=1021)

6. [![City offices are closed to observe Veterans Day on November 11](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)](https://www.lakestevenswa.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=1015)

7. [![Frontier Heights Park closure November 2025 - February 2026](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)](https://www.lakestevenswa.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=1018)

   To complete the Phase II construction project, Frontier Heights Park will be closed November 3, 2025 - February 2026. [Read on...](https://www.lakestevenswa.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=1018)
8. [![volunteer opportunity](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)](https://www.lakestevenswa.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=1016)

9. [![Cavalero Hill Park is now owned and managed by the City of Lake Stevens](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)](https://www.lakestevenswa.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=980)

   #### [Cavalero Hill Park Ownership Transfer](https://www.lakestevenswa.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=980)

   Effective October 20, 2025, The City of Lake Stevens owns and manages Cavalero Hill Park. [Read on...](https://www.lakestevenswa.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=980)

16. [![Snohomish County Parks boat launch pass no longer accepted at Davies Beach after December 31, 2025](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)](https://www.lakestevenswa.gov/CivicAlerts.aspx?AID=970)

1. ![City of Lake Stevens](https://www.lakestevenswa.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=4201 "City of Lake Stevens")

1. **City Hall and Permit Counter Hours**

   Monday through Thursday  
   9 am to 12 pm, 1 pm to 4 pm

   Friday  
   9 am - 12 pm

1. **City Hall**   
     
   1812 Main Street (physical)  
   P.O. Box 257 (mailing)  
   Lake Stevens, WA 98258

   Phone: (425) 622-9400

1. **Police Department**

   1825 S Lake Stevens Road  
   Lake Stevens, WA 98258

   Phone: (425) 622-9401
